Home > Bath > All Bath Brands > Duravit>Mirrors,https://www.kbauthority.com/duravit-lc738200000-l-cube-39-3-8-inch-mirror-with-lighting-led-dimming-function.html,"Duravit LC738200000 L-Cube 39-3/8 Inch Mirror with Lighting, LED Dimming Function",__@ LC738200000,__@ $965.45,__@  40%,__@ $1620.00,https://www.kbauthority.com/images/T/36/LC7382_dbmpi4.jpg,"Duravit LC738200000 L-Cube 39-3/8 Inch Mirror with Lighting, LED Dimming Function

column2: This is how designer Christian Werner describes the vision that gave rise to L-Cube – a bathroom furniture program that eliminates all unnecessary elements to achieve the ultimate in simplistic beauty. With fewer “distractions”, the bathroom user is inspired to truly relax and unwind. The geometry of the sleek, rectangular furniture fronts remain uninterrupted by hardware.

column1: The clever mirror features a “frame of light”, which can be turned on and off with a simple hand motion.
480-Lux LEDs ensure perfect, glare-free illumination that is also dimmable.
The mirror widths are perfectly coordinated to match the L-Cube furniture series.

column3: Mirrors require a GFCI 110 V 60 Hz power source
Flat plug will be supplied with mirror
LED module 3500 Kelvin light color, 48 W

Duravit LM7887D0000 Universal mirrors 39 3/8 W x 27 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Features:

  • Premium-Version
  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Dual Light Fields
  • Led Dimming Function
  • 1 Sensor Switch Bottom Right
  • De-Fogging System with Auto-Off Function
  • Led Light for Washbasin Area
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Led Module 4000 Kelvin Light Color
  • 32 Watt
  • Universal Mirrors Collection

Dimensions:

  • Width: 39.375 Inch
  • Depth: 1.375 Inch
  • Height: 27.5 Inch

SKU: LM7887D0000

Duravit BR7001 Brioso 24 3/8 W x 27 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Duravit has Worked with Designer Christian Werner to Design a Furniture Series that Represents Airiness, Freshness and Joie De Vivre in Today’s Bathroom.The Range stands out with Its Precise, Finely Nuanced Geometry which is Produced by Slender Cabinet Frames that Form the Edges of the Furniture, Mirrors, and Mirror Cabinets.

Features:

  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Single Light Field
  • Led Dimming Function
  • 1 Sensor Switch Bottom Right
  • De-Fogging System with Auto-Off Function
  • Led Light for Washbasin Area
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led Module 4000 Kelvin Light Color
  • 17 Watt
  • Brioso Collection

  • Height: 27.5 Inch

column2: Another wonder creation from designer Philipe Starck, this mirror is sure to stun and please. Duravits fascinating fixture is the latest style statement in both classic and modern households. Loaded with latest hi-tech features the mirror is quite user-friendly and provides the much-needed refreshing ambience in your bathroom. Provided with sensor switch and complete with LED light, this IP44 rated mirror is a must-buy.

The elegant, skilfully designed mirror (43 1/2"" x 30 1/8""), integrates perfectly within the range. The all-round LED lighting creates perfect illumination and a pleasant lighting atmosphere in the bathroom.

column3: Mirror require to be hard-wired to a wall switch using standard 110V 60Hz power source
Flat plug will be supplied with mirror

column4: Distance between sensor and reflecting surfaces = minimum 3""

Duravit DS746603737 DuraStyle 17 3/4 W x 31 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

Features:

  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Dimming Function
  • 1 Sensor Switch Bottom Right
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led Module 3500 Kelvin Light Color
  • 11 Watt
  • Durastyle Collection

Dimensions:

  • Width: 17.75 Inch
  • Depth: 1.625 Inch
  • Height: 31.5 Inch

SKU: DS746603737

Duravit DS747003737 DuraStyle 47 1/4 W x 31 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

However, Individuality does Not Mean Making an Impression with All Means. Simply an Ambiance which Reflects Itself, Gives Your Personality Air to Breathe and Space to do Your Own Thing. Such as Durastyle: Designed by Matteo Thun & Partners, the Range of Bathrooms is Revealed as Deliberately Discreet – and Blends Harmoniously Into Practically Any Ambiance for This Very Same Reason.

Features:

  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Dimming Function
  • 1 Sensor Switch Bottom Right
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led Module 3500 Kelvin Light Color
  • 28 Watt
  • Durastyle Collection

Dimensions:

  • Width: 47.25 Inch
  • Depth: 1.625 Inch
  • Height: 31.5 Inch

SKU: DS747003737

Duravit HP7480 Happy D.2 Plus 27 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

The Archetypical Open Oval of the Happy D. Design Classic Runs Through All the Elements in This New Range. Above-Counter Basins with Precise Lines, Stand-Alone Consoles and Matching Tall and Semi-Tall Cabinets as Well as Circular Mirrors Combine to Create Perfectly Harmonized Washing Areas.

The Circular Mirrors are Available with the All-Round Lightning Strips in Two Finishes: Radial (Graphic-Radiating) and Organic (Bionic-Geometric). Whether You are Dealing with a Large Bathroom for Two Or a Small Individual Guest Bathroom: with the Mirrors in Two Sizes (Ø 27 1/2"" and 35 3/8"") You are Able to Light Up Every Washing Area.The Variant with Icon Control has a Defogger, an Ambient Light Mode and Switching Function for Colored Light: at a Luminosity of More Than 3 Lux, the Light Color can be Continuously Adjusted From 2,7 (Warm Light) to 6,5 Kelvin (Cold Light). with the Set of Two Mirrors (27 1/2""), the Innovative Wireless Technology that is Preset at the Factory, Allows the Synchronization of All Mirror Functions.

Features:

  • Sensor-Version
  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Light Field (Circular)
  • Light Field Pattern Choosable
  • Led Dimming Function
  • 1 Sensor Switch Centered at the Bottom
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Led Module 3500 Kelvin Light Color
  • 31 Watt
  • Happy D.2 Plus Collection

Dimensions:

  • Width: 27.5 Inch
  • Depth: 1.875 Inch
  • Height: 27.5 Inch

Pattern Options:

  1. Organic: HP7480G0000
  2. Radial: HP7480S0000

SKU: HP7480S0000 HP7480G0000

Duravit HP7485 Happy D.2 Plus 27 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

The Archetypical Open Oval of the Happy D. Design Classic Runs Through All the Elements in This New Range. Above-Counter Basins with Precise Lines, Stand-Alone Consoles and Matching Tall and Semi-Tall Cabinets as Well as Circular Mirrors Combine to Create Perfectly Harmonized Washing Areas.

The Circular Mirrors are Available with the All-Round Lightning Strips in Two Finishes: Radial (Graphic-Radiating) and Organic (Bionic-Geometric). Whether You are Dealing with a Large Bathroom for Two Or a Small Individual Guest Bathroom: with the Mirrors in Two Sizes (Ø 27 1/2"" and 35 3/8"") You are Able to Light Up Every Washing Area.The Variant with Icon Control has a Defogger, an Ambient Light Mode and Switching Function for Colored Light: at a Luminosity of More Than 3 Lux, the Light Color can be Continuously Adjusted From 2,7 (Warm Light) to 6,5 Kelvin (Cold Light). with the Set of Two Mirrors (27 1/2""), the Innovative Wireless Technology that is Preset at the Factory, Allows the Synchronization of All Mirror Functions.

Features:

  • Icon-Version
  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Light Field (Circular)
  • Light Field Pattern Choosable
  • Led Ambient Light (Circular)
  • Led Dimming Function
  • De-Fogging System with Auto-Off Function
  • Progressive
  • Synchronous Adjustment of the Light Color for Direct and Ambient Light
  • Dimming Function and Adjustment of the Light Color with Memory Effect
  • Touchless Control Panel
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led (Life Span > 30
  • 000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Led Module 2700 - 6500 Kelvin Light Color
  • 62 Watt
  • Happy D.2 Plus Collection

  • Width: 27.5 Inch
  • Depth: 2.125 Inch
  • Height: 27.5 Inch

  2. Radial: HP7485S0000

column2: As modern life places greater demands upon us, we, in turn, also start to demand more. These demands also extend to the bathroom, which we expect to be attractive, inviting and also functional. Ketho takes this development into account: designed by Christian Werner, the new range of bathroom furniture is characterised by clear forms, well thought-out functionality and comfortable quality. The characteristic, ergonomic handles feature throughout the range and give Ketho its true originality. The reduced look of the range is fl exible enough to suit any modern bathroom ambience. Combined with good value for money, Ketho becomes the ideal range for first-time buyers.

column3: Mirror cabinets require to be hard-wired to a wall switch
US style junction box will be supplied with cabinet
LED module 3500 Kelvin light color, 10 W

Duravit LM780500000 Universal mirrors 23 5/8 W x 27 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design.   • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Ambient Light (4 Sided)
  • External Switch
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Led Module 4000 Kelvin Light Color
  • 36 Watt
  • Universal Mirrors Collection

  • Width: 23.625 Inch
  • Depth: 1.25 Inch
  • Height: 27.5 Inch

Duravit LU976200000 Luv 63 W x 31 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

The Unusual Design of the Luv Series, Designed by Cecilie Manz, Combines Nordic Minimalism with Timeless Elegance. Gentle Forms Follow a Stringent Geometry. Luv is Defined by Precise, Clear and Fine Forms and Edges.The Designer's Original Vision for This Range Was a Bowl Filled with Water on a Table.The Result is a New Design Language That, Both Minimalist and Elegant, can be Interpreted in a Highly Individual Manner.

The Mirrors also Echo the Design Language of the Series and Have Rounded Edges.They are the Ideal Complement to the Washing Area.The Touchless, Dimmable Illuminated Area at the Upper Edge of the Mirror Provides Just the Right Light for Every Situation. Further High-Tech Elements are Concealed Discretely Inside the Mirror. a Touchless Control Panel Integrated in the Mirror can be Used to Select Led Lighting, the Dimmer Function and Mirror Heating.The Latter Ensures a Clear Mirror View, even After a Hot Shower.

  • cEGS/IAPMO

  • Led Dimming Function

Home > Bath > All Bath Brands > Duravit>Mirrors,https://www.kbauthority.com/duravit-s1964100000-starck-1-30-1-8-x-43-1-2-inch-furniture-mirror-with-lighting.html,Duravit S1964100000 Starck 1 30-1/8 x 43-1/2 Inch Furniture Mirror with Lighting,__@ S1964100000,__@ $2549.12,__@  40%,__@ $4280.00,https://www.kbauthority.com/images/T/35/capecod%23spiegel_06_6303%2342_58_2.jpg,"Duravit S1964100000 Starck 1 30-1/8 x 43-1/2 Inch Furniture Mirror with Lighting

column2: The simple, natural, fundamental elements of life. With his Starck 1 range, he achieved just that… and almost immediately wrote bathroom history. With Starck 1, Philippe Starck and Duravit have returned to the beginnings of hygiene, body care and wellness in addition to the evolution of the bathroom. The Starck 1 toilet, bathtub and washbasin are unmistakable descendents of their historic predecessors – the bucket, tub and washbowl – even though they have been completely reinterpreted. It’s great to know that something good doesn’t have to be “optimized”: since their market launch in 1994, all products in the range – ceramic, furniture, tubs, accessories – have been meticulously crafted by hand using the same methods. This quality is nothing less than you would expect from a modern classic like Starck 1.

Another wonder creation from designer Philipe Starck, this mirror is sure to stun and please. Duravits fascinating fixture is the latest style statement in both classic and modern households. Loaded with latest hi-tech features the mirror is quite user-friendly and provides the much-needed refreshing ambience in your bathroom. Provided with sensor switch and complete with LED light, this IP44 rated mirror is a must-buy.

The elegant, skilfully designed mirror (43 1/2"" x 30 1/8""), integrates perfectly within the range. The all-round LED lighting creates perfect illumination and a pleasant lighting atmosphere in the bathroom.

column3: Mirror require to be hard-wired to a wall switch using standard 110V 60Hz power source
Flat plug will be supplied with mirror

column4: Distance between sensor and reflecting surfaces = minimum 3""

Duravit VE746600000 Vero 17 3/4 W x 31 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

Not Without Reason is the Vero Ceramic Series a Modern Design Classic that has Now been a Duravit Bestseller for More Than a Decade: Its Consistently Rectangular Design is Not Only Elegant But also Timeless. with the New Bathroom Furniture Collection, Vero has been Promoted to a Complete Bathroom.

  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Dimming Function
  • 1 Sensor Switch Bottom Right

  • Led Module 3500 Kelvin Light Color
  • 11 Watt
  • Vero Collection

  • Height: 31.5 Inch

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

The Xsquare Bathroom Furniture Range Combines Different Materials to Produce Something Quite New.The Wooden Finishes of the Cabinets and Vanity Units Contrast with the Striking Chrome Profiles that Feature Throughout the Range and Lend It an Exciting, High-Class Style.

Features:

  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Dual Light Fields
  • 24 Watt
  • Led Ambient Light (Top & Bottom 15-45 Watt)
  • Led Dimming Function
  • De-Fogging System with Auto-Off Function
  • Progressive
  • Synchronous Adjustment of the Light Color for Direct and Ambient Light
  • Dimming Function and Adjustment of the Light Color with Memory Effect
  • Touchless Control Panel
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led Module 2700 - 6500 Kelvin Light Color
  • 45 Watt
  • Xsquare Collection

Dimensions:

  • Width: 31.5 Inch
  • Depth: 1.625 Inch
  • Height: 31.5 Inch

Duravit XV7033 XViu 40 1/8 W x 31 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

The Post-Industrial Elegance of the Pieces Emerges From the Interaction of Soft, Organic Forms with a Precise Geometry and Details Finished to a Previously Unattainable Level of Perfection. Sharp Contrasts Arise From Surfaces that Combine the Finest Ceramics, Glass and Metal with Matt Lacquers Or High-Quality Woods.

The Xviu Mirror with Its Icon-Driven Control is Able to Regulate a Perfect Lightning, an Ambient Lightning, Defogger and Different Color Temperatures From Sunny to Dark Light.The Lateral Profiles of the Mirror Cabinets with Fully-Mirrored Sides Reflect the Individual Design Language of Xviu.The Variant with Icon Control on the Mirror Surface, a First for Mirror Cabinets, also Features the Ambient Light Mode and Colored Light Switching Function.

Features:

  • Sensor-Version
  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Dual Light Fields
  • 25 Watt
  • Led Ambient Light (Top)
  • 18-28 Watt Starting at Mirror Width 52""
  • 1 Sensor Switch Bottom Right
  • Led Dimming Function
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led Module 3500 Kelvin Light Color
  • 25 Watt
  • Xviu Collection

  • Width: 40.125 Inch
  • Depth: 1.625 Inch
  • Height: 31.5 Inch

Lateral Aluminum Finish Options:

  1. Champagne Matte
  2. Black Matte

Duravit XV7041 XViu 24 3/8 W x 31 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

The Post-Industrial Elegance of the Pieces Emerges From the Interaction of Soft, Organic Forms with a Precise Geometry and Details Finished to a Previously Unattainable Level of Perfection. Sharp Contrasts Arise From Surfaces that Combine the Finest Ceramics, Glass and Metal with Matt Lacquers Or High-Quality Woods.

The Xviu Mirror with Its Icon-Driven Control is Able to Regulate a Perfect Lightning, an Ambient Lightning, Defogger and Different Color Temperatures From Sunny to Dark Light.The Lateral Profiles of the Mirror Cabinets with Fully-Mirrored Sides Reflect the Individual Design Language of Xviu.The Variant with Icon Control on the Mirror Surface, a First for Mirror Cabinets, also Features the Ambient Light Mode and Colored Light Switching Function.

Features:

  • Icon-Version
  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Dual Light Fields
  • 25 Watt
  • Led Ambient Light (Top & Bottom 16-69 Watt)
  • De-Fogging System with Auto-Off Function
  • Progressive
  • Synchronous Adjustment of the Light Color for Direct and Ambient Light
  • Touchless Control Panel
  • Dimming Function and Adjustment of the Light Color with Memory Effect
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led Module 2700 - 6500 Kelvin Light Color
  • 44 Watt
  • Xviu Collection

Duravit XV7045 XViu 52 W x 31 1/2 H Inch Mirror with Lighting

Duravit has been the Proud Recipient of Numerous International Design Awards.These Awards Celebrate Bold Design, which has Become Duravit’s Hallmark over the Years.Each Duravit Designer is a Specialist in His Field – a Prominent Global Innovator with an Inherent Sense for Good Design. Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

The Post-Industrial Elegance of the Pieces Emerges From the Interaction of Soft, Organic Forms with a Precise Geometry and Details Finished to a Previously Unattainable Level of Perfection. Sharp Contrasts Arise From Surfaces that Combine the Finest Ceramics, Glass and Metal with Matt Lacquers Or High-Quality Woods.

The Xviu Mirror with Its Icon-Driven Control is Able to Regulate a Perfect Lightning, an Ambient Lightning, Defogger and Different Color Temperatures From Sunny to Dark Light.The Lateral Profiles of the Mirror Cabinets with Fully-Mirrored Sides Reflect the Individual Design Language of Xviu.The Variant with Icon Control on the Mirror Surface, a First for Mirror Cabinets, also Features the Ambient Light Mode and Colored Light Switching Function.

Features:

  • Icon-Version
  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Dual Light Fields
  • 25 Watt
  • Led Ambient Light (Top & Bottom 16-69 Watt)
  • De-Fogging System with Auto-Off Function
  • Progressive
  • Synchronous Adjustment of the Light Color for Direct and Ambient Light
  • Touchless Control Panel
  • Dimming Function and Adjustment of the Light Color with Memory Effect
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Led Module 2700 - 6500 Kelvin Light Color
  • 69 Watt
  • Xviu Collection

Dimensions:

  • Width: 52 Inch
  • Depth: 1.625 Inch
  • Height: 31.5 Inch

Lateral Aluminum Finish Options:

  1. Champagne Matte
  2. Black Matte

Good Design, as Duravit and Its Designers See It, is never at the Expense of Practicality – Neither is Interested in “Design for Design’s Sake”.That’s You, the Bathroom User, and Your Own Set of Needs and Requirements. Thanks to an Ongoing Dialogue with Its Trade Partners and Sanitary Ware Dealers, Duravit is Best Able to Address these Needs and Requirements in the Brand’s Designs. Simply Put, Duravit Recognizes Good Bathroom Design by the Fact that It Seems Specially-Created to Suit All Individual Tastes.This Fusion of Duravit’s Environmentally-Friendly Production Technologies with the Company’s Meticulous Quality Control Results in Products that are Highly Functional and Long-Lasting.At Duravit, Sustainable Materials, Modern Expertise and the Foresight to Recognize What Will be Important Tomorrow Comprise the Essential Ingredients for Beautiful – and Responsible – Living Bathrooms.

The Post-Industrial Elegance of the Pieces Emerges From the Interaction of Soft, Organic Forms with a Precise Geometry and Details Finished to a Previously Unattainable Level of Perfection. Sharp Contrasts Arise From Surfaces that Combine the Finest Ceramics, Glass and Metal with Matt Lacquers Or High-Quality Woods.

The Xviu Mirror with Its Icon-Driven Control is Able to Regulate a Perfect Lightning, an Ambient Lightning, Defogger and Different Color Temperatures From Sunny to Dark Light.The Lateral Profiles of the Mirror Cabinets with Fully-Mirrored Sides Reflect the Individual Design Language of Xviu.The Variant with Icon Control on the Mirror Surface, a First for Mirror Cabinets, also Features the Ambient Light Mode and Colored Light Switching Function.

Features:

  • Icon-Version
  • cEGS/IAPMO
  • Led Dual Light Fields
  • 25 Watt
  • Led Ambient Light (Top & Bottom 16-69 Watt)
  • De-Fogging System with Auto-Off Function
  • Progressive
  • Synchronous Adjustment of the Light Color for Direct and Ambient Light
  • Touchless Control Panel
  • Dimming Function and Adjustment of the Light Color with Memory Effect
  • Led (Life Span > 30000 Hours)
  • Led Module Permanently Enclosed
  • Mirrors Require a Gfci 110 V 60 Hz Power Source
  • Flat Plug Will be Supplied with Mirror
  • Xviu Collection

Dimensions:

  • Width: 71.625 Inch
  • Depth: 1.625 Inch
  • Height: 31.5 Inch

Lateral Aluminum Finish Options:

  1. Champagne Matte
  2. Black Matte

SKU: XV70480B1B1 XV70480B2B2
